projects.title: Natarajan and Co
projects.description: A retail store website highlighting their expertise in providing professional services and solutions for businesses. The website showcases their commitment to quality and client satisfaction.

projects.title: Melody Photography - Karaikudi
projects.description: A portfolio website for a professional photography studio, featuring galleries, service details, and contact information. The site highlights the studio's expertise in capturing memorable moments and showcases a variety of photography styles.

projects.title: AI based Image restoration model
projects.description: A deep learning project that restores and enhances old or damaged images using advanced neural networks. The model removes noise, repairs missing parts, and improves image clarity automatically.

projects.title: Zudo AI - chatbot
projects.description: A conversational AI chatbot built with Python, featuring voice recognition and natural language processing. Accessible via a web interface, it enables users to interact through speech, ask questions, and receive intelligent responses in real time.
